name: Yakarl the Scourge
aura: Increases Ally ATK in Doom Tower by 43%

skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Will ignore [Shield] buff if there are 1 or more enemies under [Freeze] debuff. Will also ignore [Block Damage] buff if there are 2 or more enemies under [Freeze] debuff. Will also ignore 30% of the target’s DEF if there are 3 or more enemies under [Freeze] debuff.

Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 3 turns and a 75% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Also steals 100% of the target’s Turn Meter and places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on this Champion for 3 turns.

Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. If the target is under a [Freeze] debuff, removes the debuff after attacking and places it on all enemies except the initial target. Will also attacks all enemies except the initial target after the third hit.

[Passive Effect] Decreases the damage this Champion receives by 10% and increases the damage this Champion inflicts by 10% if there are 1 or more enemies under [Freeze] debuff. Increases this Champion’s SPD by 15 and RES by 50 if there are 2 or more enemies under [Freeze] debuff.
